summary: The diff shows a comprehensive redesign of LoginPrompt.tsx that implements most of the required features. REQ-24 through REQ-29 are largely addressed. However, one testimonial quote has a minor deviation from the exact specified text, and the diff is truncated so some details cannot be fully verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Testimonials section must include the verbatim quote 'Laptop running smooth again'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the second testimonial quote as 'Laptop running smooth again â€” couldn't believe how fast the fix was!' which is not verbatim. The AC requires the quote 'Laptop running smooth again' to be present verbatim.
